message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and see how the game goes!
You wanted 50/50, I'll offer you less, but still a decent share!
You offered me less than 50/50, so I'll try to get closer to that. This is my counteroffer!
You're getting closer to 50/50, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're not giving up, neither am I! I'll try to get even closer to 50/50 this time.
